snapshot_summary.description: Fylle is an AI-powered content generation platform that helps businesses create high-quality, brand-consistent content at scale. The platform combines advanced LLMs with deep company context to generate authentic content that resonates with target audiences.
snapshot_summary.target_audience: Marketing teams, content managers, and business leaders in B2B tech companies

clarifying_questions.question: What type of content do you primarily create or plan to create?
clarifying_questions.reason: Understanding your content focus helps us tailor the generation to your specific use case and format preferences.

clarifying_questions.question: Who is your primary target audience?
clarifying_questions.reason: Knowing your audience allows us to adjust tone, complexity, and messaging to resonate with the right people.

clarifying_questions.question: How would you describe your brand voice and tone?
clarifying_questions.reason: This ensures the generated content maintains consistency with your existing brand identity and communication style.

message: Onboarding started for Fylle AI. Please answer the clarifying questions to help us understand your content needs better.
